# blazed.city
[![Blazed Labs](https://img.shields.io/badge/Blazed-Labs-red?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/webp;base64, "Blazed Labs")](https://blazedlabs.com/)

Virtual city and engagement platform for Blazed contributors and stakeholders.

## Quick start

```sh
git clone https://github.com/peaceiris/mkdocs-material-boilerplate.git
cd mkdocs-material-boilerplate
pipenv sync --dev
pipenv shell
inv serve --config-file mkdocs-sample.yml
```
